entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -42.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 12:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -42.6°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -46.8°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 46.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 46. Wind chill near minus 61. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:37 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 42.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 42. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 54 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:37 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 44. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:37 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
